mapper.select:
SELECT , TGB.f_name AS gbName,TB.f_name AS buildingname,TRR.f_num_tail AS roomNum,TRR.f_unit_name AS unitName, date_format(CKUA.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CKUAsys0AddTime FROM t_cloud_key_user_audit CKUA INNER JOIN t_group_building TGB ON CKUA.t_group_building_f_id=TGB.f_id
and TGB.f_id in
#{item}
and TGB.f_id = -2
LEFT JOIN t_building TB ON CKUA.t_building_f_id=TB.f_id LEFT JOIN t_real_room TRR ON TRR.f_id = CKUA.t_real_room_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND TRR.f_unit_name=#{unitName} AND TB.f_name=#{buildingname}
AND (CKUA.f_status=#{status} )
AND (CKUA.f_hua_id=#{huaId} )
AND (TGB.t_property_management_f_id=#{propertyManagerId})
and (CKUA.f_sys0_add_time = str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (CKUA.f_sys0_add_time >= str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime_START},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (CKUA.f_sys0_add_time <= str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime_END},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
ORDER BY CKUA.f_id DESC

SELECT COUNT(CKUA.f_id) FROM t_cloud_key_user_audit CKUA INNER JOIN t_group_building TGB ON CKUA.t_group_building_f_id=TGB.f_id
and TGB.f_id in
#{item}
and TGB.f_id = -2
LEFT JOIN t_building TB ON CKUA.t_building_f_id=TB.f_id LEFT JOIN t_real_room TRR ON TRR.f_id = CKUA.t_real_room_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND TRR.f_unit_name=#{unitName} AND TB.f_name=#{buildingname}
AND (CKUA.f_status=#{status})
AND (CKUA.f_hua_id=#{huaId})
AND (TGB.t_property_management_f_id=#{propertyManagerId})
and (CKUA.f_sys0_add_time = str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (CKUA.f_sys0_add_time >= str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime_START},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (CKUA.f_sys0_add_time <= str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime_END},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )

SELECT , TGB.f_name AS gbName,TB.f_name AS buildingname,TRR.f_num_tail AS roomNum,TRR.f_unit_name AS unitName, date_format(CKUA.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CKUAsys0AddTime FROM t_cloud_key_user_audit CKUA LEFT JOIN t_group_building TGB ON CKUA.t_group_building_f_id=TGB.f_id LEFT JOIN t_building TB ON CKUA.t_building_f_id=TB.f_id LEFT JOIN t_real_room TRR ON TRR.f_id = CKUA.t_real_room_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND CKUA.f_id=#{auditId}
mapper.sql:
FROM t_car_num_pay_log TCNPL INNER JOIN t_car_num_list TCNL ON TCNPL.t_car_num_id = TCNL.f_id
INNER JOIN t_group_building TGB ON TGB.f_id = IF(TCNPL.t_group_building_f_id IS NOT NULL, TCNPL.t_group_building_f_id, TCNL.t_group_building_f_id)
and TGB.f_id in
#{item}
and TGB.f_id = -2
INNER JOIN t_property_company TPC ON TGB.t_property_company_f_id = TPC.f_id AND TPC.f_admin_id=#{userId} LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order TEO ON TEO.f_id = TCNPL.t_ebuy_order_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order_ext EOE ON EOE.t_ebuy_order_f_id=TEO.f_id AND EOE.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_room_has_car_num TRHCN ON TRHCN.t_user_id = TEO.f_buyer_id AND TCNL.f_id=TRHCN.t_car_num_list_f_id AND TRHCN.f_sys0_del_state=0
LEFT JOIN t_real_room TRR on TRR.f_id=TCNL.f_real_room_id AND TRR.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND TRR.t_building_f_id !=- 1 LEFT JOIN t_building TB ON TB.f_id = TRR.t_building_f_id AND TB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_group_building GB2 ON GB2.f_id=TB.t_group_building_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND TCNPL.f_sys0_del_state=0 AND TCNPL.f_pay_time IS NOT NULL AND TCNPL.f_status!=2 AND TCNPL.f_status=#{payType} AND TCNPL.f_status=0 AND LOCATE(#{pcName}, TPC.f_name)>0 AND LOCATE(#{gbName}, GB2.f_name)>0 AND LOCATE(#{parking}, TGB.f_name)>0 AND LOCATE(#{carNum}, TCNL.t_car_num)>0
AND TCNPL.f_pay_num = 0
AND TCNPL.f_pay_num > 0 AND 12 > TCNPL.f_pay_num
AND TCNPL.f_pay_num >=12
AND (TCNPL.f_pay_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
AND (TCNPL.f_pay_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )

FROM t_revenue_signal_amount RSA INNER JOIN t_finance_buy fb ON fb.f_order_no = RSA.f_order_no INNER JOIN t_finance_req fr ON fb.t_finance_req_id = fr.f_id
LEFT JOIN t_car_num_list CNL ON CNL.t_car_num=fb.f_car_num LEFT JOIN t_real_room RR on RR.f_id=CNL.f_real_room_id AND RR.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND RR.t_building_f_id !=- 1 LEFT JOIN t_building B ON B.f_id = RR.t_building_f_id AND B.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_group_building GB2 ON GB2.f_id=B.t_group_building_f_id WHERE RSA.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND RSA.f_goal_type = 10
and CNL.t_group_building_f_id in
#{item}
and CNL.t_group_building_f_id = -2
AND RSA.f_goal_rev_time <= now()
AND RSA.f_mini_role_id = #{roleId}
AND RSA.f_mini_role_id in
#{tempRoleId}
AND LOCATE(#{pcName}, RSA.f_role_name)>0
AND (RSA.f_goal_rev_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
AND (RSA.f_goal_rev_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
AND 2=#{carType}
AND (2=#{payType} or 3=#{payType}) AND LOCATE(#{gbName}, GB2.f_name)>0 AND LOCATE(#{parking}, fr.f_residential)>0 AND LOCATE(#{carNum}, CNL.t_car_num)>0
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(_tmp.num) FROM (
SELECT 1 AS num
GROUP BY TCNPL.f_status, TCNPL.t_car_num_id, TCNPL.f_pay_time UNION ALL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num
)_tmp

SELECT SUM(_tmp.totalMoney) FROM (
SELECT TCNPL.f_fee AS totalMoney
GROUP BY TCNPL.f_status, TCNPL.t_car_num_id, TCNPL.f_pay_time UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(SUM(RSA.f_amount) * 100 AS signed) AS totalMoney
)_tmp
SELECT date_format(TCKUA.f_sys0_del_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') FROM t_cloud_key_user_audit TCKUA WHERE 1=1 AND TCKUA.f_hua_id=#{userId} ORDER BY TCKUA.f_sys0_del_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
